community_listings.title: Rhizome Community Access Protected
community_listings.description: The Rhizome.org community page is protected by Cloudflare bot detection, which prevents automated scraping without a browser engine like Playwright. To enable automatic fetching, the workflow needs to install Playwright and Chromium.

error: HTTP 403 Forbidden - Cloudflare JavaScript challenge required

solution.description: Install Playwright in the workflow to handle JavaScript-based protection
workflow_steps: Use the scraper script at scripts/scrape_rhizome.py
solution.manual_access: Visit https://rhizome.org/community/ in a browser to view current listings

note: This data file serves as documentation of the access limitation. The workflow attempted to fetch data on October 29, 2025.
